snippet.title: Bread & Fred | Celebrating 125k Wishlists!
snippet.description:
Download the FREE Demo ► https://apo.gg/BreadAndFred 🐧
Hooray!! Join us in the comments as we celebrate 125k wishlists on Steam! 🎉
We wouldn't be here without YOU! From the teams at Sand Castles Studios and Apogee Entertainment, we are so thankful and so excited, and we absolutely can not wait to share more B&F moments with you as we get closer to release!

Grab your best bud for help in this new co-op challenge to help two adorable penguins, Bread & Fred, reach the top of the snow-capped summit. Time your jumps, cling to walls, swing across gaps & between platforms to see how far you can make it before you tumble all the way back down the mountain.  Don't have a buddy available?  Snatch your best pal, Jeff (who's a rock) and try the Single-Player Campaign!

DISCORD: ► https://discord.gg/apogee
TWITTER: ► https://twitter.com/apogee_ent
INSTAGRAM: ► https://www.instagram.com/apogeeentertainment/
FACEBOOK: ► https://www.facebook.com/ApogeeEnt/
TIKTOK: ► https://www.tiktok.com/@apogeeentertainment

_
Video Credits:

Directed by Kyle Blessing
Produced by Jeron Moore & Haydn Steffes
Edited by Kyle Blessing
Trailer Music Produced by Chipper Hammond
Voice Over by Kyle Blessing
Featuring "Morning Mood" from Edvard Grieg's Peer Gynt, Op. 23
Vocal Performances and Kazoo by Jeron Moore
Bread & Fred Theme by Tomás Palazzi
Bread & Fred Developed by: David Lozano Sánchez, Victor Valiente Martínez, Guillem Romero Martinez-Quintanilla

#Apogee #BreadAndFred #BreadAndFredDemo
